title: The Malicious Park is Open! - Malware - 0x00sec - The Home of the Hacker

data.author: REal0day
data.speak: Here’s all the malware I’ve been collecting from my honeypot.Enjoy the Park!GitHubREal0day/MaliciousParkMaliciousPark - Another Repo of Malware. Enjoy. <3

data.author: maderas
data.speak: Awesome project brother and some Tyrannosaurus (with proto feathers) love too. Nice

data.author: REal0day
data.speak: Thanks @maderas! Trying to share the wealth. Pay it forward.

data.author: FinFlag
data.speak: Sweet github of malicious things. I have been thinking of setting up malware zoo that has bit more infrastructure such as automated submission to a sandbox and other analysis tools. Do you guys have some thoughts?I have been exploring this idea:KitPloit - PenTest Tools for your Security Arsenal ☣Ph0Neutria - A Malware Zoo Builder That Sources Samples Straight From The WildLeading source of Security Tools, Hacking Tools, CyberSecurity and Network Security ☣

data.author: Techno_Forg
data.speak: @FinFlag : this could be a great project for 0x00sec (looks @pry0cc).@REal0day : nice post, I will definitely look into this stuff and will RE the hell out of it… I assuming most of these are for Windows and adware or a RAT?
